meanings.definition: The quality or state of being instantaneous.
meanings.sent1: The instantaneity of the lightning strike amazed everyone.
meanings.sent2: The instantaneity of the camera's flash captured the moment perfectly.
meanings.sent3: The magician's trick relied on the instantaneity of the disappearing act.
meanings.sent4: The sudden burst of laughter in the room had an instantaneity that was contagious.
meanings.sent5: The instantaneity of the car crash left bystanders in shock.

meanings.definition: The condition of occurring or being completed in an instant.
meanings.sent1: The instantaneity of the decision surprised everyone in the room.
meanings.sent2: The instantaneity of the fireworks display lit up the night sky.
meanings.sent3: The chef's cooking skills were so good that the instantaneity of the meal preparation left customers in awe.
meanings.sent4: The sudden applause at the concert had an instantaneity that echoed through the hall.
meanings.sent5: The instantaneity of the news spread like wildfire among the students.
